articles.content:

Bob Marleys musician grandson has died aged 31.

articles.title: FBI warns about 'pig butchering' crypto scam sweeping America - Newshub
articles.description: The FBI says America has a "pig butchering" problem.
articles.content:
The term pig butchering refers to an unsuspecting victim -- the "pig" -- being tricked by scammers into forking over money for a promised high rate of return.
Scammers "fatten up the pig by getting … [+5147 chars]
